body.p: Comth vs W H Ruggles -- indict for shooting with intent to Kill -- Carroll Circuit

The following are are the leading facts as presented on the trial -- Ruggles and Morely were drinking -- They quarreled -- Ruggles had a pistol in his hand -- Morely was standing at the head of the stairs and Ruggles at the foot. Morely told Ruggles to shoot and he fired This occurred in Moorely's house at night. Morely kept a hotel --
